title: RBI imposes penalty on BNP Paribas, 3 others
description: The Reserve Bank of India has imposed penalties on BNP Paribas and three other financial entities for non-compliance with regulatory norms. BNP Paribas was fined Rs 31.8 lakh for not adopting a uniform external benchmark within the same loan category. Hewlett Packard Financial Services, SMFG India Credit Company, and Muthoot Vehicle & Asset Finance also faced penalties.
